title: League client cant load games, Disconnects me and says i have no current internet connection
body:
Happened last night, about 10 mins into a game and i get attempting to reconnect. for the next 10 minutes after that i reset my client/computer and internet. All failed, at one stage it loaded to about 50% in, then disconnected again (no current internet connection). 
switched onto my phone net and re connected, lost the game and got a nice 5 game low priority queue.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you currently using a wired or wireless connection?
yeah this has been happening to me, impossible to play a game in last week, had no help from riot
ah great, ive just downgraded to old client and repaired game. also added league of legends as a exception to my anti virus, ill let ya know the results
